projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React featuring dark/light mode, smooth animations, typing effects, project modals, contact form with validation, and professional glassmorphism design. Deployed on Vercel.

projects.title: Agent Orchestration LangGraph
projects.description: An intelligent agent orchestration system using LangGraph framework for building complex AI workflows. Implements multi-agent coordination, task planning, and dynamic agent communication.

projects.title: Credit Risk & Fraud Detection with XAI
projects.description: A comprehensive machine learning solution for credit risk assessment and fraud detection with Explainable AI (XAI). Uses SHAP and LIME for model interpretability, featuring real-time risk scoring, anomaly detection, and detailed model explanations.

projects.title: Handwritten Character Recognition
projects.description: A deep learning-based system for recognizing handwritten characters using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). Trained on standard datasets with high accuracy.

projects.title: AI Based Resume Analyzer
projects.description: An intelligent ATS (Applicant Tracking System) resume analyzer that parses resumes, extracts skills, and calculates compatibility scores using NLP and cosine similarity.

projects.title: Disease Prediction System
projects.description: A machine learning system for predicting diseases based on patient symptoms and medical history. Implements multiple classification algorithms with ensemble methods and high accuracy predictions.

projects.title: LLM Writer-Critic System
projects.description: An advanced AI system using LangGraph framework for intelligent writer-critic workflows. Implements multi-turn refinement where an LLM generates content while another critiques and improves it, featuring stateful conversations and context-aware iterations.
